page.title: 11INDUSTRIES IN BRENTWOOD
page.content: Brentwood's industries are mainly light. There are no large heavy industries. Most people commute to London.The industries which are here are a{sign-making}industry which has been in Brentwood for{36 years}and is a{two man}business. A larger industry is the {vacuum flask} factory which employs{200-300 people}and has been in Brentwood for{31 years}.These are both in the Ongar Road. Also along the Ongar Road is an industrial estate which deals with { {kitchens, electrical and Heraeus {equipment and packing.}All these people said that they thought Brentwood is a fairly good place for Industry and has improved by the M25 connection. {Berger Paints}employs{54 {people}and has been here for{2 years}. As Brentwood is near to London and has the M25 it has room for expansion.
